attributes.action: hold an independent, internationally sanctioned enquiry into the voting problems in the Scottish Elections
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The electoral commission has already said it will investigate the problems with the postal vote and the large number of spoilt ballots, but the electoral commission was involved in the setting up of the election in the first place. We would like to see an independent enquiry that can investigate the commission and the process without prejudice.
